responses.rationale: Reports a numerical count ('11.7 million turkeys') using a standard verb ('raises').
Reports a numerical count ('46 million chickens') using standard verbs ('is', 'had').
Reports numerical counts of birds killed ('13 million chickens and 305,000 turkeys') using standard verbs ('accounts for', 'having to kill').
Reports numerical counts of birds killed ('22 million birds', '1.8 million', '1.9 million', '1.9 million') using standard verbs ('mean', 'have had to kill', 'including').
Reports numerical counts of birds killed ('5.3 million hens and 88,000 turkeys') using standard verbs ('has infected', 'forcing the killing').
The segment reports locations of cases, not numerical data or economic metrics.
Reports a numerical count ('35,500 birds') using a standard verb ('confirmed').
Reports a numerical count ('23 states') using standard verbs ('shows', 'have confirmed').
The segment describes the cause of disease spread, not numerical data or economic metrics.
